text: "Wrapped Around Your Finger" is a 1983 single by English band The Police. It was taken from their fifth studio album Synchronicity. It went to number 1 in Ireland and Poland, number 5 in Spain, number 6 in France, number 7 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in the United States and number 10 in Canada. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:The Police songs
title: Wrapped Around Your Finger
